rules.rule_text: Investment strategy must be presented in conformity with legal documentation
rules.detailed_description: Strategy presentation must match prospectus including: investment thresholds by asset class, strategy description, geographic allocation, minimum investment amount

rules.rule_text: Risk profile must be exhaustive and conform to prospectus
rules.detailed_description: Complete risk profile mention must match prospectus exactly, including SRI indicator

rules.rule_text: SRI must match prospectus exactly with disclaimer on same slide
rules.detailed_description: Synthetic Risk Indicator (SRI X/7) must be displayed exactly as in prospectus with associated disclaimer

rules.rule_text: Performance benchmark must be the official one from prospectus
rules.detailed_description: Performance must be compared to prospectus benchmark. No other benchmark allowed, even for information

rules.rule_text: Benchmark specifications must match prospectus terms
rules.detailed_description: Benchmark details (e.g., dividends included/reinvested for equity funds) must match prospectus exactly

rules.rule_text: Performance target must match if defined in prospectus objective
rules.detailed_description: If fund has a target (e.g., outperformance objective, target + X%), performance must be compared to this target as stated in prospectus

rules.rule_text: Portfolio holdings count must be in prospectus if mentioned in presentation
rules.detailed_description: Number of portfolio lines/holdings can only be mentioned if this objective is stated in the prospectus

rules.rule_text: All data must be consistent with legal documentation (KID, Prospectus, SFDR Annex)
rules.detailed_description: Verify conformity of ALL data with legal documentation (KID, Prospectus, SFDR Annex). Data must be coherent across all documents

rules.rule_text: Asset allocation ranges must match prospectus thresholds
rules.detailed_description: Investment thresholds by asset class must match prospectus ranges (e.g., 60-100% equities)

rules.rule_text: Geographic allocation must match prospectus specifications
rules.detailed_description: Geographic allocation ranges must conform to prospectus (e.g., minimum 60% Europe)

rules.rule_text: Investment objective must match prospectus exactly
rules.detailed_description: Fund's investment objective statement must align with prospectus wording

rules.rule_text: Minimum investment amount must match prospectus
rules.detailed_description: Minimum ticket/subscription amount must be stated as in prospectus
Fee structure must match prospectus exactly (fixed fees, variable fees, performance fees)

rules.rule_text: Fund characteristics at end must be detailed and accurate
rules.detailed_description: End of presentation must include detailed fund characteristics conforming to prospectus
